DOC.brief_summary: This research meant evaluate effectiveness two different prevention program post-acute management rheumatoid osteo-arthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Park Nicollet Clinic Institute Clinical Systems Integration ( ICSI ) develop evidence-based care guideline intervention strategy include degenerative joint disease . Included guideline risk factor increase limitation , obesity physical activity . The aim research modify well-established weight management technique physical activity promotion intervention accord ICSI recommendation , implement intervention diverse patient population , demonstrate short long term impact intervention . The approach individual randomize controlled trial 400 patient , 200 coach-supported intervention , 200 self-directed intervention .
DOC.criteria: clinical visit 11/1/2003 april 30/2004 diagnosis code rheumatoid arthritis low extremity osteoarthritis saw provider consent patient invited participate consent contact research
